meanings.sent1: After sitting in the sun, the metal car pyrexes quickly.
meanings.sent2: The oven pyrexes when you turn it on to bake cookies.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream pyrexes in the hot summer sun, making it melt faster.
meanings.sent4: His anger pyrexes slowly until it reaches a boiling point.
meanings.sent5: The thermometer shows how the body pyrexes when someone has a fever.

meanings.sent1: She used a pyrex to bake a delicious lasagna for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The chef carefully placed the pie in the pyrex dish to bake.
meanings.sent3: The scientist conducted an experiment using various pyrexes in the lab.
meanings.sent4: The kitchen shelves were filled with colorful pyrexes of different sizes.
meanings.sent5: The baker's favorite tool was the trusty pyrex for all his baking needs.
